modName: ESO Altmer Armor and Weapon HDT SMP Redux
summary: This mod will change Altmer sword style to Altmer dagger style, increase the strength of armor and weapons from ESO Altmer Armor by NewerMind43 mod to like ESO Cinematic.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Updated 1.1.0[/u] : increase Scb meshes shape, fix Gloves glitch ( I already played game, combat during 30min and it no glitch), neft powers of weapon ( It too strong ^^ ). 
Thanks all for reporting my mod issue, i will update it better. Play fun
[u]Requirements Mod[/u]
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url]﻿ - Dagger on Back
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905]AdditemMenu
[/url]Installation of lastest SMP - HDT Patch ( Check Requirements )
[b]﻿[u]Recommend Mod[/u]
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56614/]Enchanted Arsenal[/url]﻿ - for better enchanted effect
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57408/]HDT Equipment[/url] - Well Fitted 
[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65376]ESO Altmer Armor by NewerMind43[/url] 
[url=http://www.9damao.com/home.php?mod=space&uid=1153]XML SMP-HDT and Meshes edited from Delphin[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=Landing_page]Creation Kit[/url]﻿
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]Nifskope[/url]
author: Yuki Nguyen
